Private

60%PlayStation 3

A decent racing game. But way to difficult to unlock the last level. Unlocking the last level requires you to achieve first place in all the 20 levels before. An that is quite a challenge! Extremely frustrating to be speeding towards a win and then suddenly get knocked over by another truck and have to start the map from start again. On the other hand, quite rewarding to win a race you been struggling with.

All in all more frustration than i like in a racing game.

RRC123

90%PlayStation 3

To my surprise I liked the insane, over-the-top crashes and extreme racing of Motorstorm more than Burnout 3. While the physics can be unpredictable and spell ruin for you in higher-level races, it's still a really fun game which arcade racing fans should not overlook.
